R23.nl_constraint: The rock sample at waypoint6 should never be collected

children.nl_constraint: The rock sample must always remain at waypoint6 throughout the entire mission

content.text:
<documents>
<pddl_domain>
;; Enrico Scala (enricos83@gmail.com) and Miquel Ramirez (miquel.ramirez@gmail.com)
(define (domain rover)
       (:requirements :typing :fluents)
       (:types
              rover -object
              waypoint -object
              store -object
              camera -object
              mode -object
              lander -object
              objective -object
       )
       (:predicates
              (in ?x - rover ?y - waypoint)
              (at_lander ?x - lander ?y - waypoint)
              (can_traverse ?r - rover ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?r - rover)
              (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?r - rover)
              (equipped_for_imaging ?r - rover)
              (empty ?s - store)
              (have_rock_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (have_soil_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (full ?s - store)
              (calibrated ?c - camera ?r - rover)
              (supports ?c - camera ?m - mode)
              (available ?r - rover)
              (visible ?w - waypoint ?p - waypoint)
              (have_image ?r - rover ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (communicated_soil_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_rock_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_image_data ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (at_soil_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (at_rock_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (visible_from ?o - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (store_of ?s - store ?r - rover)
              (calibration_target ?i - camera ?o - objective)
              (on_board ?i - camera ?r - rover)
              (channel_free ?l - lander)
              (in_sun ?w - waypoint)
       )

       (:functions
              (energy ?r - rover)
              (recharges)
              (total-energy-used)
              (n_navigate ?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              (n_recharge ?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (n_samplesoil ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_samplerock ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_drop ?x - rover ?y - store)
              (n_calibrate ?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (n_takeimage ?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              (n_communicatesoildata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicaterockdata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicateimagedata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
       )

       (:action navigate
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (can_traverse ?x ?y ?z) (available ?x) (in ?x ?y)
                     (visible ?y ?z) (>= (energy ?x) 8)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 8)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 8)
                     (not (in ?x ?y))
                     (in ?x ?z)
                     (increase (n_navigate ?x ?y ?z) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action recharge
              :parameters (?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?w) (in_sun ?w) (<= (energy ?x) 80))
              :effect (and (increase (energy ?x) 20) (increase (recharges) 1)
                     (increase (n_recharge ?x ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplesoil
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?x) 3) (at_soil_sample ?p) (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x) (empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 3)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 3)
                     (have_soil_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_soil_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplesoil ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplerock
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p) (>= (energy ?x) 5)
                     (at_rock_sample ?p) (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x)(empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 5)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 5)
                     (have_rock_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_rock_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplerock ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action drop
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - store)
              :precondition (and (store_of ?y ?x) (full ?y) (>= (energy ?x) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (not (full ?y)) (empty ?y)
                     (increase (n_drop ?x ?y) 1)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action calibrate
              :parameters (?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (equipped_for_imaging ?r) (>= (energy ?r) 2)(calibration_target ?i ?t) (in ?r ?w) (visible_from ?t ?w)(on_board ?i ?r)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 2)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 2)
                     (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (increase (n_calibrate ?r ?i ?t ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action takeimage
              :parameters (?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              :precondition (and (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (on_board ?i ?r)
                     (equipped_for_imaging ?r)
                     (supports ?i ?m)
                     (visible_from ?o ?p)
                     (in ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (have_image ?r ?o ?m)
                     (not (calibrated ?i ?r))
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
                     (increase (n_takeimage ?r ?p ?o ?i ?m) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicatesoildata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_soil_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
              )
              :effect (and (communicated_soil_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicatesoildata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicaterockdata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_rock_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_rock_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicaterockdata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicateimagedata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_image ?r ?o ?m)(visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 6)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_image_data ?o ?m)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 6)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 6)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicateimagedata ?r ?l ?o ?m ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )
)
</pddl_domain>

<information>
The user will give as input a natural language constraint that must be translated into PDDL3.0. The translation will be used by a PDDL planner.
</information>

<instructions> 
- Translate the input constraint into correct PDDL3.0.
- The resulting PDDL3.0 constraint must capture the same meaning as the initial input constraint.
- Remember that PDDL3.0 constraints are state-based. They can only refer to existing precates and fluents, thus, not to actions.
- Be sure to include temporal logic like operators in your translation.
- Format your answer such as there is no preambule and such that the PDDL translation is between the tags <pddl> and </pddl>.
</instructions>

<user_input>
The rock sample must always remain at waypoint6 throughout the entire mission
</user_input>

The user wants me to translate a natural language constraint into PDDL3.0. The constraint is: "The rock sample must always remain at waypoint6 throughout the entire mission"

Let me analyze this:
1. This is about a rock sample that should always remain at waypoint6
2. The word "always" indicates this is a temporal logic constraint that must hold throughout the entire execution
3. In PDDL3.0, temporal logic constraints use operators like "always", "sometime", "at-most-once", etc.
4. I need to look at the domain to see what predicate represents a rock sample being at a waypoint

Looking at the domain, I can see there's a predicate:
(at_rock_sample ?w - waypoint)

And in the problem file, I can see:
(at_rock_sample waypoint6)

So the rock sample is initially at waypoint6.

The constraint should be that (at_rock_sample waypoint6) must always be true throughout the mission.

In PDDL3.0, the "always" temporal logic operator is used for constraints that must hold throughout the entire execution.

The syntax would be:
(always (at_rock_sample waypoint6))

This means that the predicate (at_rock_sample waypoint6) must be true in every state during the execution.

;; Enrico Scala (enricos83@gmail.com) and Miquel Ramirez (miquel.ramirez@gmail.com)
(define (domain rover)
       (:requirements :typing :fluents)
       (:types
              rover -object
              waypoint -object
              store -object
              camera -object
              mode -object
              lander -object
              objective -object
       )
       (:predicates
              (in ?x - rover ?y - waypoint)
              (at_lander ?x - lander ?y - waypoint)
              (can_traverse ?r - rover ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?r - rover)
              (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?r - rover)
              (equipped_for_imaging ?r - rover)
              (empty ?s - store)
              (have_rock_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (have_soil_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (full ?s - store)
              (calibrated ?c - camera ?r - rover)
              (supports ?c - camera ?m - mode)
              (available ?r - rover)
              (visible ?w - waypoint ?p - waypoint)
              (have_image ?r - rover ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (communicated_soil_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_rock_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_image_data ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (at_soil_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (at_rock_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (visible_from ?o - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (store_of ?s - store ?r - rover)
              (calibration_target ?i - camera ?o - objective)
              (on_board ?i - camera ?r - rover)
              (channel_free ?l - lander)
              (in_sun ?w - waypoint)
       )

       (:functions
              (energy ?r - rover)
              (recharges)
              (total-energy-used)
              (n_navigate ?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              (n_recharge ?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (n_samplesoil ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_samplerock ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_drop ?x - rover ?y - store)
              (n_calibrate ?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (n_takeimage ?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              (n_communicatesoildata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicaterockdata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicateimagedata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
       )

       (:action navigate
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (can_traverse ?x ?y ?z) (available ?x) (in ?x ?y)
                     (visible ?y ?z) (>= (energy ?x) 8)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 8)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 8)
                     (not (in ?x ?y))
                     (in ?x ?z)
                     (increase (n_navigate ?x ?y ?z) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action recharge
              :parameters (?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?w) (in_sun ?w) (<= (energy ?x) 80))
              :effect (and (increase (energy ?x) 20) (increase (recharges) 1)
                     (increase (n_recharge ?x ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplesoil
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?x) 3) (at_soil_sample ?p) (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x) (empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 3)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 3)
                     (have_soil_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_soil_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplesoil ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplerock
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p) (>= (energy ?x) 5)
                     (at_rock_sample ?p) (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x)(empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 5)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 5)
                     (have_rock_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_rock_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplerock ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action drop
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - store)
              :precondition (and (store_of ?y ?x) (full ?y) (>= (energy ?x) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (not (full ?y)) (empty ?y)
                     (increase (n_drop ?x ?y) 1)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action calibrate
              :parameters (?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (equipped_for_imaging ?r) (>= (energy ?r) 2)(calibration_target ?i ?t) (in ?r ?w) (visible_from ?t ?w)(on_board ?i ?r)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 2)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 2)
                     (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (increase (n_calibrate ?r ?i ?t ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action takeimage
              :parameters (?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              :precondition (and (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (on_board ?i ?r)
                     (equipped_for_imaging ?r)
                     (supports ?i ?m)
                     (visible_from ?o ?p)
                     (in ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (have_image ?r ?o ?m)
                     (not (calibrated ?i ?r))
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
                     (increase (n_takeimage ?r ?p ?o ?i ?m) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicatesoildata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_soil_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
              )
              :effect (and (communicated_soil_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicatesoildata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicaterockdata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_rock_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_rock_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicaterockdata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicateimagedata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_image ?r ?o ?m)(visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 6)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_image_data ?o ?m)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 6)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 6)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicateimagedata ?r ?l ?o ?m ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )
)
</pddl_domain>

<user_input>
The rock sample at waypoint6 should never be collected
</user_input>

Let me analyze the user constraint and the PDDL problem to understand what needs to be constrained.

The user wants: "The rock sample at waypoint6 should never be collected"

Looking at the PDDL problem, I can see that:
1. There's a rock sample at waypoint6: `(at_rock_sample waypoint6)`
2. Rock samples can be collected using the `samplerock` action
3. When a rock sample is collected, the predicate `(at_rock_sample ?p)` becomes false (it's removed)
4. The rovers that can potentially collect rock samples are those equipped for rock analysis: rover0, rover2, and rover3

The constraint needs to be state-based and follow Linear Temporal Logic. I can't directly reference the `samplerock` action, but I can reference the state changes that result from that action.

The key insight is that if the rock sample at waypoint6 should never be collected, then the predicate `(at_rock_sample waypoint6)` should always remain true throughout the execution.

In Linear Temporal Logic terms, this would be: G(at_rock_sample waypoint6) - meaning "globally/always, the rock sample is at waypoint6"

Since I need to avoid PDDL language, I should phrase this in natural language that captures the same meaning.

Let me think about this constraint:
- The rock sample should always remain at waypoint6
- No rover should ever pick up the rock sample from waypoint6
- The rock sample at waypoint6 should be preserved throughout the mission

I think the most direct way to express this is: "The rock sample must always remain at waypoint6" - this captures that the sample should never be removed/collected.

Actually, let me be more precise. The constraint is that the rock sample should never be collected, which means it should always be present at waypoint6. In the PDDL domain, when a rock sample is collected, the `(at_rock_sample ?p)` predicate is removed, so the constraint is that this predicate should always remain true for waypoint6.
 
I've carefully considered the constraint's precise formulation. The statement is straightforward and unambiguous, directly specifying the requirement that the rock sample must permanently stay at its current location. No further refinement is needed to capture the intent of preserving the sample's position throughout the mission.

<constraints>

</constraints>

<explanation>
The constraint directly translates to ensuring the rock sample at waypoint6 is never removed from that location, which effectively prevents any rover from collecting it during the mission execution.
